title: Jobs at Art Museums (JAM 2022): Curatorial Affairs
short_description: Meet staff whose decisions and knowledge shape the stories told both inside and outside of the museum’s galleries.
header_description: JAM is a unique opportunity for college students to make professional connections and learn about careers in the museum field.
list_description: Meet staff whose decisions and knowledge shape the stories told both inside and outside of the museum’s galleries.
description:
Meet staff whose decisions and knowledge shape the stories told both inside and outside of the museum’s galleries.

Speakers:
Kylie Escudero, Project Manager, Exhibition Design

Emily Fry, Director of Interpretation, Publishing

Chloe Pelletier, Curatorial Associate, European Painting and Sculpture

Participation by museum staff and departments does not indicate a need to hire. Staff will not be accepting resumes or offering interviews. For questions, email universitypartners@artic.edu.
